item.title: US tariffs on Canada and Mexico will happen on Tuesday, says commerce chief
item.description: Donald Trump has threatened 25% blanket tariffs against his two neighbours.

item.title: Blatter and Platini back in court in Swiss Fifa fraud case
item.description: Ex-Fifa head Sepp Blatter and French football great Michel Platini were cleared in 2022, but prosecutors appealed.

item.title: Nigerian Muslims arrested for eating in public during Ramadan
item.description: A total of 25 people are arrested for either not fasting or selling food during the fasting month.

item.title: Watch: Stars celebrate at glitzy Oscars after party
item.description: Award winners and nominees headed for a night of partying across Los Angeles after the Oscars ceremony concluded.

item.title: Thousands evacuated as Japan's biggest fire in decades continues to burn
item.description: At least one person has died and more than 80 buildings have been damaged in the blaze.
